name: .JBIG2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .JBIG2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Bitonal image saved in the Joint Bi-level Image Group 2 (JBIG2) format; store the image using black and white with 1 bit per pixel; may be lossy or lossless; enables greater compression than the CCITT Fax Group 4 algorithm; often used for scanned images and faxes; replaces the previous .JBIG specification.

content: The JBIG2 format separates regions of the image into text, halftone images, and generic regions. This enables the algorithm to optimize compression for distinct areas of the image.
NOTE: Images in the JBIG2 format also use the .JB2 file extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
